popup.title: Your privacy
popup.description: We use cookies to ensure the site works properly, analyze traffic and personalize content. Please consent to their use.
popup.footer: By clicking outside the banner or scrolling the page, you accept all cookies

necessary.title: Essential cookies and localStorage
necessary.summary: Save your settings and keep the site running.
necessary.description: Includes: consent preferences (cookie-consent), language (pollar-language), color theme (pollar-theme), anonymous visitor ID (pollar_uid), AI assistant session ID (pollar-visitor-id), AI assistant conversation history (pollar-ai-store), stock watchlist (stock-watchlist), countries filter (pollar-selected-countries), stock chart scale (pollar-chart-smart-scale), Connections game state (pollar.powiazania), and UTM campaign parameters (pollar_utm, sessionStorage). Umami Analytics — anonymized statistics without cookies (no consent required). Sentry — error monitoring (no cookies, data processed under legitimate interest).

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.summary: Help us understand how you use the site.
analytics.description: Google Analytics (_ga, _ga_*) — visit statistics. Firebase Analytics — in-app events (for logged-in users). Microsoft Clarity (_clck, _clsk) — heatmaps and session recording. Contentsquare — heatmaps and session recording.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.summary: Measure the effectiveness of our ad campaigns.
marketing.description: X (Twitter) Ads — ad conversion tracking (guest_id, guest_id_marketing, guest_id_ads, personalization_id, muc_ads).

settings.notice: Changes to cookie settings are saved automatically and take effect immediately. To completely remove all cookies, clear your browser data.
